benchmark_details.name: ASCIIEval
benchmark_details.overview: ASCIIEval benchmarks models' visual perception ability in text strings via ASCII art recognition tasks. It includes a comprehensive evaluation of over 3,000 samples categorized within an elaborate classification tree.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To analyze and enhance models' ability to perceive visual semantics embedded within ASCII art using a dual-purpose benchmark.

data.source: Collected from online artist galleries and datasets, manually curated and annotated.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy evaluated through exact matches between model predictions and correct options.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better visual perception ability in recognizing ASCII art.
